arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How did Carlisle United fare against Grimsby?
arts.sum: Carlisle United lost 2-1 to Grimsby Town in Mark Hughes’ first game in charge...so how did we rate the players at Blundell Park?

arts.ttl: Carlisle lose first game under Mark Hughes as Grimsby fight back for victory
arts.sum: Hughes replaced Mike Williamson earlier this week.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United lose at Grimsby in Hughes' first game in charge
arts.sum: REPORT: Mark Hughes suffered defeat in his first game in charge of Carlisle United as Grimsby came from behind at Blundell Park.

arts.ttl: New Carlisle United No2 gives up cruise to join the Blues
arts.sum: New Carlisle United assistant boss Glyn Hodges gave up a cruise around the Caribbean in order to join Mark Hughes at Brunton Park.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United eyeing free agent, says Clarkson
arts.sum: Carlisle United are weighing up a potential free agent signing under new boss Mark Hughes, sporting director Rob Clarkson says.

arts.ttl: How the stats reflect on Hughes' chances to engineer Carlisle United's great escape
arts.sum: CAN new boss Mark Hughes engineer Carlisle United's great escape? Here is what the stats make of his chances.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United teenager seals north-east loan move
arts.sum: Teenage Carlisle United prospect Sam Hetherington has joined National League North club Darlington on loan.

arts.ttl: Grimsby boss on what he's expecting from Hughes' Carlisle United
arts.sum: Grimsby Town boss David Artell expects to face a Carlisle United side given “renewed vigour” by the arrival of Mark Hughes.

arts.ttl: Former Carlisle United man Burey makes overseas move
arts.sum: Released Carlisle United wide man Tyler Burey has joined a new club - in Bosnia.

arts.ttl: Mark Hughes: Why I joined Carlisle United - and my plan to keep Blues up
arts.sum: INTERVIEW: Mark Hughes on his appointment at Carlisle United, his plan to keep the Blues in the EFL and more...
